fixed_skill.desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes equal to 40.7/42.7/44.8% of Attack, ignoring their defense.
fixed_skill.name: Megidola

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Maragidyne

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 60.8/63.8/66.9% of Attack. 33.8/35.5/37.2% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mabufudyne

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. When using a skill to attack a Burning or Frozen foe, increase Attack by 20%. If the foe is both Burning and Frozen, increase effect by 100%.
passive_skill.name: Sweet Dreams

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. When using a skill to attack a Burning or Frozen foe, increase Attack by 24%. If the foe is both Burning and Frozen, increase effect by 100%.
passive_skill.name: Sweet Dreams I

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 17.7%. When using a skill to attack a Burning or Frozen foe, increase Attack by 28%. If the foe is both Burning and Frozen, increase effect by 100%.
passive_skill.name: Sweet Dreams II

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 180.0%/192.6%/205.2% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
